title: Juan Diego Ormaechea
text:
Juan Diego Ormaechea (born 28 January 1989) is an <a href="Uruguayan%20people">Uruguayan</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who generally plays as a <a href="number%20eight%20%28rugby%20union%29">number eight</a> represents <a href="Uruguay%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Uruguay</a> internationally. He was included in the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup%20squads">Uruguayan squad</a> for the <a href="2019%20Rugby%20World%20Cup">2019 Rugby World Cup</a> which is held in Japan for the first time and also marks his first World Cup appearance.
Career.
He made his international debut for Uruguay against <a href="Portugal%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Portugal</a> on 13 November 2011.
